name: FreeNMAP
short_description: FreeNMAP is the next generation network and network application mapping system available under the BSD license. The main goal is to provide truly free network mapping software compatible with and functionally equivalent to Nmap with no strings attached.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License
